title: Menopause: the truth, the rumours and you
creator_credit: Margaret Slaght, Canadian Broadcasting Corporation and The National and The Journal
brief_description: An international award winning two part documentary featuring Germaine Germaine Greer which explores myths and misconceptions about menopause, the common problems women experience and investigates alternative therapies.
